result.value:
Tests can be run as follows:

    python3 -m pytest -v --pyargs extra_geom

In the source directory, you can also omit `--pyargs extra_geom`.
Use EuXFEL detector geometry to assemble images
Python tools to work with EuXFEL detector geometry and assemble detector images.

*EXtra-geom* is available on our Anaconda installation on the Maxwell cluster:

    module load exfel exfel_anaconda3

You can also install it [from PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/EXtra-geom/)
to use in other environments with Python 3.6 or later:

    pip install extra_geom

If you get a permissions error, add the `--user` flag to that command.

There is one optional feature: install `extra_geom[interpolate]` to use
the `position_modules_interpolate` method (slow).

result.description:
## What's Changed

* Update Github actions versions by @takluyver in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/219
* Bump pyfai from 2023.3.0 to 2023.5.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/220
* Update xarray requirement from <2023.5.0 to <2023.6.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/221
* Bump pytest-cov from 4.0.0 to 4.1.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/222
* Fix channel numbering in LPD diagram by @takluyver in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/225
* Label AGIPD-500k with M0-M7 module numbers by @takluyver in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/226
* Update h5py requirement from <3.9.0 to <3.10.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/230
* Update pytest requirement from <7.4.0 to <7.5.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/231
* Bump pillow from 9.5.0 to 10.0.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/233
* Allow older versions of Pillow on older Pythons by @takluyver in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/234
* Update xarray requirement from <2023.6.0 to <2023.7.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/232
* Bump extra-data from 1.12.0 to 1.13.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/227
* Update numpy requirement from <1.25.0 to <1.26.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/228
* Bump pyparsing from 3.0.9 to 3.1.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/229
* Bump extra-data from 1.13.0 to 1.14.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/236
* Bump pyparsing from 3.1.0 to 3.1.1 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/237
* Update xarray requirement from <2023.7.0 to <2023.9.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/239
* Update RTD config file to v2 by @takluyver in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/240
* Update coverage requirement from <7.3 to <7.4 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/238
* Bump kiwisolver from 1.4.4 to 1.4.5 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/241
* Bump pyfai from 2023.5.0 to 2023.9.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/244
* Implement example geometries for all detectors by @JamesWrigley in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/243
* Update matplotlib requirement from <3.8.0 to <3.9.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/246
* Update numpy requirement from <1.26.0 to <1.27.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/247
* Bump numexpr from 2.8.4 to 2.8.7 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/248
* Update xarray requirement from <2023.9.0 to <2023.10.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/249
* Bump cycler from 0.11.0 to 0.12.1 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/252
* Update h5py requirement from <3.10.0 to <3.11.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/253
* Update pillow requirement from <10.1.0 to <10.2.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/254
* Update xarray requirement from <2023.10.0 to <2023.11.0 in /.github/dependabot by @dependabot in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/255
* Add release notes for 1.11 by @takluyver in https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/pull/256


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/European-XFEL/EXtra-geom/compare/1.10.0...1.11.0
